data.name: AccountChange_RestartSteam
data.value: Modified data requires a restart to steam and whether a restart to Steam is required.

data.name: AccountChange_ShareManageAboutTips
data.value: Adjust the priority order of the Steam account shared on the current device to solve the problem that the sharing of account B that wants to play is always using the sharing of account A, from top to bottom, the priority order of the shared library is used, or you can choose to temporarily disable or enable the sharing of the specified account. Save after the adjustment and restart Steam to take effect!

data.name: Achievement_ResetWaring_2
data.value: Confirm resetting achievement progress as well?

data.name: Achievement_ResetWaring_3
data.value: Instead of reverting the current modifications, this operation zeros all achievements and stats. Are you really sure?

data.name: Achievement_RiskWarning
data.value: Reminder: Unlocking achievements may be deemed as cheating by game developers

data.name: Achievement_StoreTip

data.name: Achievement_Warning_1
data.value: Failed to establish connections with Steam. This could be because this game does not have achievements, or because you do not own this game.

data.name: Achievement_Warning_2

data.name: Achievement_Warning_4

data.name: CommunityFix_AutoRunProxy
data.value: Start routing your connections upon launching Watt Toolkit

data.name: CommunityFix_OnlySteamBrowser
data.value: Only enable for Steam built-in browser

data.name: CommunityFix_ProxyMode_HostsTip
data.value: Route your traffic by modifying the hosts file based on your preferences. This mode runs more smoothly and only affects those websites that you select below, but it requires port 443 not to be in use.

data.name: CommunityFix_ProxyMode_WinSystemTip
data.value: Route your traffic by setting up a Windows system proxy. It does not require a free port 443, yet it will affect all local network traffic. If hosts routing mode works, you won't be needing this mode.

data.name: CommunityFix_StartProxyFaild
data.value: Failed to route your connections. Certificate improperly installed.

data.name: CommunityFix_StartProxyFaild443_
data.value: The acceleration service fails to start {0} port is occupied. Close the program that occupies the {0} port or try to use system proxy mode.

data.name: CommunityFix_StartProxyFaild443___
data.value: The acceleration service failed to start and the {0} port was occupied by {1} ({2}). Close the program that occupies the {0} port or try to use system proxy mode.

data.name: CommunityFix_ReadHosts_IOException
data.value: Reading or restoring files failed due to being occupied by other processes, possibly other incompatible network accelerators, please locate the occupied process and close it.

data.name: CommunityFix_DNSErrorNotify
data.value: DNS resolution encountered an exception, try modifying other DNS in the proxy settings again

data.name: GameList_AddAFKAppsWarningCountTips

data.name: GameRelated_Borderless_MoveMouseTip
data.value: Drag the cross to game window to perform subsequent actions.

data.name: GameRelated_Borderless_ToWallerpaperTip
data.value: *Game running as a desktop wallpaper may be incontrollable and irresponsive to inputs. This bug can be fixed but it has not yet become the primary focus of this software. Hence, this bug may persist in several future updates. The wallpaper will freeze at the last remaining frame of the game after it stops running. A single click on 'Refresh wallpaper' button may reset the wallpaper to default. This feature conflicts with other live wallpaper softwares such as Wallpaper Engine. Quit other softwares like Wallpaper Engine before using this feature.

data.name: LocalAuth_ImportFaild
data.value: Failed to import Authenticator. Please check validity of your imported data.

data.name: LocalAuth_LockError
data.value: Cannot lock Authenticator without a password

data.name: LocalAuth_NoAuthTip
data.value: No Authenticator imported. Click on gear icon in upper right corner to start import.

data.name: LocalAuth_ProtectionAuth_EnablePasswordTip
data.value: Your Authenticator will be encrypted by your password which is required for accessing the Authenticator. If you forget this password and do not have a valid back-up of the Authenticator, you will lose access to it.

data.name: LocalAuth_ProtectionAuth_Info
data.value: It is highly recommended to password protect your Authenticator, otherwise your data may be accessed and stolen by other malwares. This is not mandatory, however your Authenticator may run at risk of being stolen.

data.name: LocalAuth_ProtectionAuth_IsOnlyCurrentComputerEncrypt
data.value: This Authenticator can only decrypted on this PC

data.name: LocalAuth_ProtectionAuth_IsOnlyCurrentComputerEncryptTip
data.value: In addition, you can use Windows built-in account encryption to protect your data. This locks your Authenticators to the current user on this computer, so even if they're duplicated, they will remain inaccessible. You must turn this feature off if you want to reformat your disk, reinstall Windows or delete this user account.

data.name: LocalAuth_ProtectionAuth_NoChangeTip
data.value: No changes made to be saved

data.name: LocalAuth_ProtectionAuth_VerifyPasswordErrorTip
data.value: Your entered password does not match

data.name: LocalAuth_SDATip
data.value: A desktop implementation of Steam Authenticator. Please import from file named 'maFile' in 'maFiles' folders under SDA path. (Encrypted files not supported. Remove password before continuing)

data.name: LocalAuth_ShowSteamAuthTip1
data.value: Complete data of your Steam Authenticator which can be imported into different softwares:

data.name: LocalAuth_ShowSteamAuthTip2
data.value: After enabling two-step Authenticator in Steam, a recovery code is generated which you can use in Steam client to disable the Authenticator.Do remember and store it in a safe place.

data.name: LocalAuth_SMSCodeTip
data.value: Please enter the SMS verification code sent to your phone.

data.name: LocalAuth_SteamAppImportTip
data.value: You can import Steam Authenticator from your rooted Android device at: /data/data/com.valvesoftware.android.steam.community . Paste the corresponding data in these files into the text box below.

data.name: LocalAuth_SteamGuardTip
data.value: In the 'files' folder, open the 'SteamGuard-NNNNNNNNN' file and paste the entire contents of the file

data.name: LocalAuth_SteamTradeLoginTip
data.value: Confirming transactions requires a logged in Steam status. Watt Toolkit will not record your password, but rather save a local logged-in status.

data.name: LocalAuth_SteamUserImportSuccess
data.value: You have successfully imported your token through account login, please finally test whether your token can be used normally, if it is not available, the import may fail, try to re-import and delete the invalid token.

data.name: LocalAuth_SteamUser_Error

data.name: LocalAuth_SteamUser_Requires2FA

data.name: LocalAuth_WinAuthTip
data.value: WinAuth is Windows' portable open source authenticator, which provides counter-based or time-based RFC 6238 authenticators and common implementations. Import method: After exporting the txt file from WinAuth, select it here for importing.

data.name: Settings_UI_EnableDesktopBackground_Error
data.value: Enabling this feature when the background transparency material is {0} is not supported

data.name: Settings_UI_EnableDesktopBackground_Tip
data.value: *Experimental feature (it is recommended to set transparent materials to Transparent or AcrylicBlur when turned on) This feature can set the wallpaper of Wallpaper Engine and other wallpaper software as the program background, and if you have not started Wallpaper Engine, you will use the desktop background by default. The background only works in the main window, other windows recommend adjusting the transparency not to be completely transparent or using the image background. When using, pay attention to switching the corresponding theme according to the brightness and darkness of the wallpaper to get better results.

data.name: Steam_UserLoginTip

data.name: About_Donate_Title
data.value: Supports the development of Watt Toolkit

data.name: About_Donate_Desc
data.value: The release of the current version of Watt Toolkit can't be separated from everyone's support, and if Watt Toolkit is helpful to you, and you want us to keep new features developed and maintained for a long time, you may consider giving us a little contribution to make our more dynamic update maintenance Watt Toolkit. *Please remember to have the UID of your Watt Toolkit account in the notes message when making a donation, so that we can feed the donation reward back to your account later.
